Description: The recipe for Zebra cake is written down in old culinary notebooks of many housewives, possibly even mothers and grandmothers. Perhaps this is one of those recipes that do not age over the years. Zebra cake is fluffy, soft, very tasty and looks original. Such pastries are always useful at a family tea party.
Name: Cupcake Zebra

Description: Lovers of savory and hearty pastries will love them. Delicate, airy and aromatic muffins with a hint of cheese, can be served with tea, coffee or milk. They are good hot and cold.
Name: Cheese muffins

Description: English scones are an unforgettable treat and nothing like the American scones sold at so many large-scale coffee shops. Try this simple recipe using cultured kefir for an extra-tender crumb to your very British scones.
Name: Simple scones kefir

Description: There are many layers of love in these chocolate brownies.
Name: Chocolate Brownies

Description: Fancy a fish supper ready in under half an hour? Mix up your midweek meal with our satisfyingly spicy chorizo and cod stew.
Name: Cod & chorizo stew

Description: I don't know where I got this recipe, but I have been using it for well over 20 years. Works well in a slow cooker.
Name: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls

Description: Feeling lazy? Try this super simple and tasty Cabbage Roll Casserole recipe for a great weeknight or 'lazy day' meal.
Name: Lazy Day Cabbage Roll Casserole

Description: How do you cook duck in the oven? Do you stuff it with apples , rice, cabbage? Or messing around with the filling isn't yours? In this case, take note of a simple dish - duck marinated in soy sauce and honey. It is being prepared practically without your participation. The roasting sleeve and oven will do all the work for you.  A duck in a sleeve baked in the oven has a number of advantages: the meat cooks relatively quickly, retains a lot of moisture and turns out to be incredibly juicy, and besides, you don't need to wash a whole mountain of dishes. Rub the carcass with spices, marinate, wrap in a sleeve and put in the oven for 2 hours. The gala dinner will be ready by the appointed time!
Name: Duck in the sleeve in the oven
